name: Adventures of RoboBear
description: You must pass all four levels by jumping platform to platform, to win the game,this is the only win condition and you must do it by not dying,if you die you will start from the beginning,this is the only lose condition, there are no time limits.You can clone yourself by once by entering pods.If you lose one clone and still have at least one character,you still have a chance to win.If you lose all of them,you will spawn at the beginning.
